column4: 2015. beloved son of the late joseph s. and christine giegucz. loving brother of nancy (john) peabody
column12: michael and the late eugene giegucz. also survived by numerous nieces and nephews. joey was a resident of allegheny valley school and an avid participant of special olympics. he worked for several years in the cafeteria at bayer corporation. he was a lifelong fan of all pittsburgh sports teams and a huge pro wrestling fan. joey's capacity for affection was boundless
column13: he always had a hug and kiss for everyone. singing and dancing were two of his favorite pastimes. his zest for life will be sadly missed by all who knew him. friends received 2-4 and 6-8 p. m. wednesday only at brusco-napier funeral service
column17: pa 15216. mass of christian burial in st. catherine of siena church on thursday at 10 a. m. interment in queen of heaven cemetery. in lieu of flowers memorials may be made to the allegheny valley school
